blurb: Hi-res 3D scanned objects library for Games, VR and VFX
description: Our proposal is to deliver the reality ready to be used in virtual worlds. We are committed to the research and development of the most advanced in 3D scanner technique, in order to always achieve extreme fidelity and boost your film, game or VR productions.

title: Beam
blurb: Get paid to delight your followers via text
description: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.

title: Clubhouse Tools
blurb: Set up your Clubhouse status
description: Have you seen that people are starting to change their profile picture in Clubhouse saying that they are in radio mode or listening? That is exactly what Clubhouse Tools does. It is a web app where you can set up your status through your profile picture.

title: Grouparoo 2.0
blurb: Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration
description: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.

title: Product Wars 2
blurb: Monitor your Product Hunt Launch with Machine Learning
description: Monitor your Product Hunt Launch with Machine Learning

title: Kameleont
blurb: Create dynamic links that redirects based on device or OS
description: They are perfect to be used in email to redirect iOS users to the app store, android users to the play store and for those that uses a computer, you can redirect them to your web app. And those users we can not match, they will be sent do your default url.

title: Homeroom
blurb: Personalized short-form learning for moving up in tech
description: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.

title: Presearch 2.0
blurb: The network powering presearch decentralized search engine
description: Now you can be part of the Presearch Decentralized Search experience by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine while earning PRE tokens.

title: Steady Newsletters
blurb: Newsletters with paid memberships for independent writers
description: Steady Newsletters is for independent writers, who are looking for a home for their work and are not averse to making money from it. Send professionally designed newsletters, including videos, podcasts, and tweets. Free to use, we keep 10% commission.

title: Video SDK from Zoom
blurb: Build fully customizable video-based apps
description: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. ⠀ Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.

title: Clara
blurb: Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm
description: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
